name: Wildwood Quest
description:
Wildwood Quest is currently in early development.

You're an adventurer who arrived in a small town in the forest. Now, you decide to help the citizens and yourself by fighting bad guys, farming crops, beekeeping, crafting and a lot more!

If you want, you can even take on the adventure in online multiplayer with any number of friends!

You can download an early build of the game, test it out and give feedback or submit ideas using the comment section or by joining my Discord server.

Controls:
WASD to move
E to open your inventory
Q to open the quest log
